column1: # Description: ID Scheme in use of ID element

column3: ICOADS: ID present, but unknown type
ICOADS: ship, Ocean Station Vessel (OSV), or ice station callsign
ICOADS: generic ID (e.g., SHIP, BUOY, RIGG, PLAT)
ICOADS: other buoy number (e.g., Argos or national buoy number)
ICOADS: Coastal-Marine Automated Network (C-MAN) ID (assigned by US NDBC or other organizations)
ICOADS: composite information from early ship data
